name: Dewey Mac, Kid Detective Book - Make DIY & STEM Spy Gadgets
blurb: Action adventure story about a kid detective who uses science to build STEM (STEAM) spy gadgets & solve crimes.You can too!

name: George The Generous Giraffe | Kid's Book About Generosity
blurb: This story is about a generous giraffe named George who is very generous! Teaches kids about generosity, is engaging, & rhymes.

name: Book&ME - Inspire. Create. Personalize.
blurb: An interactive children's book that pushes creativity and makes story time magical with an accompanying app and stickers.

name: My First Science Textbook: Chemistry Story Books for Kids
blurb: Children’s books about Chemistry! Like textbooks, but way more fun for kids. Highly educational, highly memorable - and funny, too!

name: Science Wide Open: Children's Books about Women in Science
blurb: Children's books that inspire curiosity with true stories of women scientists and also teach basics of Biology, Chemistry and Physics

name: Night Light: A Book to Excite Children About the Outdoors
blurb: A young Icelandic sheep finds that not everything in the dark is scary. Night time can be beautiful, too.

name: "Synchro Sisters Forever" -- Empower Girls Through Sports
blurb: Illustrated chapter book introduces synchronized swimming and teaches value of perseverance and friendship (benefits USA Synchro)

name: Elsie presents: an illustrated Guide to Afternoon Tea!
blurb: Full of recipes, tips and secrets, this book is the perfect gift for those who love tea parties and Afternoon Tea fans!

name: My Little Red Wellies | Children's Book
blurb: An interactive Children's Book that helps encourage children to take a break from electronic devices & play outside!

name: Salty Avocado children's book by Chris Piascik & Aaron Cohen
blurb: A children's book featuring exciting illustrations about an avocado in a bad mood and the healing power of hugs by Chris and Aaron.

name: Venus Underwater
blurb: A funny, magical mermaid book that reflects the power of kids to be wise, loving and kind. Prevents self-hatred & promotes sanity!

name: Rabbel Magazine: For Creative & Curious Preteens
blurb: Our latest issue elevates the voices of women and girls around the world through inspiring, uplifting, and validating creative content.

name: The Mountain and Me
blurb: A kid-friendly introduction to mindfulness that helps children learn to manage their emotions.

name: Snow Ghost - Book
blurb: A journey for all ages. "Snow Ghost" is the latest story by Kyle Steiner.

name: Chapik’s Birthday Adventures: Children's Book
blurb: Beautifully told illustrated story about unexpected adventures of baby penguin, in New Beringia, looking for his mother on his birthday

name: Trilingual Me! Moi, trilingue!
blurb:
A bilingual book for children in English and French. 

Celebrating children learning multiple languages based on my personal journey!

name: Yogi on a Journey: Adventure Book for Children of All Ages
blurb: Yogi on a Journey is a fun and playful way to discover the benefits of the Sun Salutation, also called Surya Namaskar.

name: Hilda And Richie: A Messy and Funny Fox Book!
blurb: A charming, hilarious picture book with two red foxes having messy fun with bubble gum!

name: No Matter the Distance
blurb: A children's picture book about hope, love and the power of creativity.

name: Paralympians
blurb: A children's book series about 4 of the greatest Paralympic athletes of our time from the co-creator of Rebel Girls

name: Mommy Goes to Work: books for working moms & their littles
blurb: Celebrating working moms and making drop offs easier, one story at a time.

name: Hilda and Richie's Wizard: An Enchanting Children's Book
blurb: A charming, hilarious picture book with two foxes meeting a mysterious wizard!

name: Where's Itsy Bitsy Spider?
blurb: A Search-and-Find Adventure

name: Drawing Data with Kids - Drawing our way to Data Literacy
blurb: Learn how to make your kids data literate by drawing with them

name: Camp Liverwurst Children's Series
blurb: Provide summer camp leaders with a series of read-aloud middle-school novels to spark discussions about Jesus.

name: Our Friend Moon
blurb: An ode to the moon in the form of a specialty board book for all ages.

name: Rambles, for poetic wanderers
blurb: A budding poet joins forces with creative team to produce a stunning book of photos and poems that celebrate mystery, wonder & life.

name: A novel to break software developer stereotypes!
blurb: An exciting sci-fi novel for young adults, where female & minority students save the world from a widespread attack from hackers.

name: For Steam And Country Signed Hardcover Quickstarter
blurb: A special signed hardcover edition of the #1 Bestselling steampunk fantasy series!
